## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (40.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (43.5, -80.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), (-9.0, -48.0)
- Wooden Chests at positions (-14.5, -48.5), (-12.5, -49.5), (-9.5, -49.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-15.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -46.5), (-14.5, -45.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting from chests
- Ensure that the target chest contains the items you intend to extract. Verify the chest's inventory before attempting extraction.

### Errors when transferring iron ore to furnaces
- Make sure the furnaces have available space to accept new items. Check the furnace's inventory and status before transferring items.

### Errors when moving items from mining drill drop positions
- Confirm that the drop position is linked to a valid chest entity containing the intended items. Ensure the chest is not full and is correctly positioned to receive items from the mining drill.

### General Tips
- Regularly check the status and inventory of all entities to ensure they are functioning correctly and not blocked by full inventories or missing resources.
